attributes.action: Change the name of the House of Lords to the House of People and to select candidates for the House from a Proportional Representational system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is designed to reform the House of Lords, giving smaller parties better representation in the legislature branch of government. This pertition is not involved in what powers this new chamber should have.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
